c74object.name: abc.mc.grain~
c74object.description:
abc.mc.grain~ is parallel granular processes.
gs0, gs1, gs2, ... are the grain sizes expressed in milliseconds for the n granulators.
dt0, dt1, dt2, ... are the maximum delays expressed in milliseconds for the n granulators.
fdbk0, fdbk1, fdbk2, ... are the feedbacks of the n granulators (between 0 and 1)
rrf0, rrf1, rrf2, ... are the rarefactions of the n granulators (between 0 and 1, 0 means no rarefaction, 1 means total rarefaction)

objarg.name: instances
objarg.description: sets the number of grain process [init=1:min=1:max=16]

attribute.name: gs[index]
attribute.description: sets the grain size of the [index] granulator in ms, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=400:min=2:max=3000:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the grain size of the [index] granulator in ms

attribute.name: dt[index]
attribute.description: sets the maximum delays for the [index] granulator in ms, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=100:min=2:max=5000:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the maximum delays for the [index] granulator in ms

attribute.name: fdbk[index]
attribute.description: sets the feedback level for the [index] granulator, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. [init=0:min=0:max=0.9999:step=0.0001].
attribute.digest: sets the feedback level for the [index] granulator

attribute.name: rrf[index]
attribute.description: sets the rarefactions of the [index] granulator, [index] is an integer corresponding to the number of the process from 0, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "6" for example. The rarefactions are between 0 and 1, 0 means no rarefaction, 1 means total rarefaction. [init=0.5:min=0:max=1:step=0.001].
attribute.digest: sets the rarefactions of the [index] granulator
